the use of special software to try to obtain new cryptocurrency (= digital currency produced by a public network rather than by a government): "Mining" is the discovery of new bitcoins—just like finding gold. You can do mining on your own or join a mining "pool", where a number of people combine their processing resources and take a share of the rewards.
